CustomField.description: Positive number indicating the change in quantity (Higher quantity – lower quantity)
CustomField.formula: IF( SVMXC__New_Quantity2__c > SVMXC__Old_Quantity2__c , SVMXC__New_Quantity2__c - SVMXC__Old_Quantity2__c , SVMXC__Old_Quantity2__c - SVMXC__New_Quantity2__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Positive number indicating the change in quantity (Higher quantity – lower quantity)
CustomField.label: Change Qty
